mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoSmsEmailTmplat Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT_SN , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT_NM , USE_YN , SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT_KND_CD , SMS_CLFC_CD , SMS_CLFC_DETAIL_CD , EMAIL_CLFC_CD , EMAIL_CLFC_DETAIL_CD , SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT_SJ , SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT WHERE 1 = 1 AND SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT_SN = #{smsEmailTmplatSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoSmsEmailTmplat Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM CSO_SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT WHERE 1 = 1 AND SMS_EMAIL_TMPLAT_SN = #{smsEmailTmplatSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
